description: When you stay at Ston Easton Park, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Wells Cathedral. For a bite to eat, guests can check out Sorrel, which serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. A bar/lounge and a garden are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like Egyptian cotton sheets and bathrobes.

DESCRIPTION.value: When you stay at Ston Easton Park, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Wells Cathedral. For a bite to eat, guests can check out Sorrel, which serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. A bar/lounge and a garden are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like Egyptian cotton sheets and bathrobes.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The hotel offers a restaurant. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast each morning. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access.

2 meeting rooms are available. This romantic hotel also offers a library, multilingual staff, and a garden. Onsite self parking is complimentary.

Ston Easton Park has designated areas for smoking.

DINING.value:
A complimentary English breakfast is served each morning between 7:30 AM and 10 AM.
Sorrel - This restaurant specializes in international cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.
24-hour room service is available.

RECREATION.value: The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Farrington Park Golf Club - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Radstock Museum - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi
Stanton Drew Stone Circle - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Kilver Court - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Wells Cathedral - 10.7 km / 6.7 mi
Wookey Hole - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Wells Bishop's Palace - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Bath Spa University - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
HorseWorld - 13.6 km / 8.4 mi
Saltford Golf Club - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
Nunney Castle - 14 km / 8.7 mi
Royal Bath and West Showground - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi
Bath City Farm - 14.4 km / 9 mi
Cheddar Gorge and Caves - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Knowle Golf Club - 16.1 km / 10 mi

The preferred airport for Ston Easton Park is Bristol (BRS-Bristol Intl.) - 16.1 km / 10 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated in a rural location, this romantic hotel is within 9 mi (15 km) of Radstock Museum, Wells Cathedral, and Kilver Court. Wells Bishop's Palace and Stanton Drew Stone Circle are also within 9 mi (15 km).

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Pet fee: GBP 10.00 per pet, per stay
  • Late check-out fee: GBP 50.00
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 40.00 per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel in Radstock with restaurant, bar/lounge

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

  • Minimum check-in age is 18

HCOM_INTERNET_AT_A_GLANCE.value:
• Free WiFi in public areas

  • Free WiFi in rooms

HCOM_DINING.value: Sorrel - This restaurant specializes in international cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.

HCOM_FEES_POLICY.value: Late check-out can be arranged for an extra charge of GBP 50.00

HCOM_FEES_INROOM.value: Rollaway beds are available for GBP 40.00 per night

HCOM_FEES_TRAVELING_WITH_PETS.value: Pets are allowed for an extra charge of GBP 10.00 per pet, per stay

HOTEL_FREEBIES.value: • Free English breakfast, free WiFi, and free parking

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 22 guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Massage/treatment rooms
  • 2 meeting rooms
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Garden
  • Library
  • Lobby fireplace
  • Front desk safe
  • Laundry service
  • Conference space
  • Multilingual staff
  • Concierge services
  • Picnic area
  • Wedding services
  • Free newspapers in the lobby
  • Luggage storage
  • Porter/bellhop

ROOM_FEATURE.value: When you stay at Ston Easton Park, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Wells Cathedral. For a bite to eat, guests can check out Sorrel, which serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. A bar/lounge and a garden are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer up nice touches like Egyptian cotton sheets and bathrobes.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• Wells Cathedral (7.7 mi / 12.4 km)
  • Radstock Museum (5.5 mi / 8.9 km)
  • Kilver Court (6.8 mi / 11 km)
  • Wells Bishop's Palace (8.6 mi / 13.9 km)
  • Stanton Drew Stone Circle (9.2 mi / 14.8 km)

name: Ston Easton Park
